recipe.ingredients: 1 cup of strawberries, hulled, 1 cup of cantaloupe, cut into cubes or balls, 1 cup of honeydew melon, cut into cubes or balls, 1 cup of pineapple, cut into cubes, 1 cup of seedless grapes, 1 cup of blueberries, Wooden skewers
recipe.directions: Begin by preparing all the fruit - wash the strawberries, cantaloupe, honeydew, pineapple, and grapes. Make sure the blueberries are rinsed and free of any stems, Gently thread the fruit onto the wooden skewers, alternating types of fruit and colors for a varied and attractive presentation, Arrange the fruit kebabs on a platter and serve immediately or cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. These kebabs are best enjoyed fresh but can be made a few hours in advance.
